title: The Big Bang Theory
desc: Physicists Leonard and Sheldon find their nerd-centric social circle with pals Howard and Raj expanding when aspiring actress Penny moves in next door.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.desc: When a pretty girl named Penny moves across the hall, socially awkward scientist Leonard is instantly smitten, much to roommate Sheldon's dismay.

episodes.title: The Big Bran Hypothesis
episodes.desc: Leonard offers to receive a package on Penny's behalf, but things go awry when Sheldon feels the need to clean her apartment.

episodes.title: The Fuzzy Boots Corollary
episodes.desc: Leonard is devastated when he sees Penny kissing another man, and he asks her out on a date under the guise of a group dinner with the guys.

episodes.title: The Luminous Fish Effect
episodes.desc: Leonard calls in Sheldon's mother when Sheldon becomes obsessed with weaving ponchos and illuminating fish after being fired from his job.

episodes.title: The Hamburger Postulate
episodes.desc: After agreeing to a sexual encounter with Leslie, Leonard becomes upset when he learns she was only interested in him as a one-night stand.
